New Records: Most sixes hit by a team (SA) in one WC edition: 77
Key Match Events: Marco Jansen took 3 wickets in powerplay
Rassie van der Dussen and Quinton de Kock formed a 150+ run partnership
Pre-Game Insights: Tim Southee will be playing his first game of this World Cup
New Zealand have won their last five World Cup games against South Africa
New Zealand are in big trouble at 57/3 after Marco Jansen's wicket
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand's last-wicket partnership was their second-highest
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trent Boult was shadow batting in the middle before the game
Jimmy Neesham received treatment on his right wrist
Neesham's hand was bothering him during his 5.3 overs
Others: South Africa set a new record for consecutive 300-plus totals while batting first in men's ODIs: 8*
